posts.post_title: FS:  T206 Egan - Cycle  PSA 1.5   SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hi,

Here's a very nice card - Egan, Cincinnati with a Cycle 350 back.  As you can see, if not for the slight damage on the back, this would've been given a much higher grade.  Cool card, great bold colors.

SOLD!  Thanks

Thanks much,
Craig

I also have a T206 Thomas w/American Beauty listed on another thread.  Happy to accept offers on both.
